Description.Text:
Amber Suites Istanbul opened in Jan. 2011 and is conveniently located in the heart of the historic old city of Istanbul. Amber Suites Istanbul is located in Sultanahmet / Kumkapi ( Old City Istanbul ).
Each of rooms has a private bathroom and all rooms have been recently refurbished. In addition to updated furnishings and decor, the rooms include plasma television, direct dial telephone,air-conditioning, central heating, minibar etc.. The hotel also provides amenities as dry cleaning, library, lobby, reception and smoke-free hotel.

The hotel is one of the most conveniently located budget hotels in central Istanbul.Amber Suites is one of the more affordable hotels central of Historical Istanbul such as near Grand Bazaar, Blue Mosque, St. Sophia, Topkapi Palace, Hippodrome Area, Turkish & Islamic Art Museum, Sultaahmet Area, Yerebatan Cistern, Mosaic Museum. All of them are well-known important historical monuments center in Istanbul.
